Reviews.Title: “A nice stay”
Reviews.Author: ColumbusChow
Reviews.Content: relatively considered standard hk owners hotel friendly helpful nice recommend food tickets tourism spots disneyland ocean park etc available thru hotel hotel clean cozy location perfect eating food shopping near mrt station 2 min walk bus stop taking airport

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: Artscene
Reviews.Content: friendly host location short taxi ride airport express kowloon terminal convenient shopping adn eating street temple street night market frill seen ones elsewhere wifi fine complain book line call hotel reserve honour system secure feeling manager keeping

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hospitality, close to MTR station, value-for-money”
Reviews.Author: LeeSK
Reviews.Content: starters chung accommodating friendly greetings everytime stepped hotel recommended dine attended queries time smile personally clean daily bedsheets clean worry bed bugs deluxe double reasonably sized hk standard bed comfy mattress location 2 mins walking distance jordon mtr station exit 2 mins store 7eleven 2 mins favourite thanks chung note preferably call reservation

Reviews.Title: “Great location, easy access, and friendly owner!”
Reviews.Author: CK G
Reviews.Content: hotel term size stayed hey hong kong complain size considered average hong kong location literally 2 mins jordan mtr station plus friendly owner run hotel clean fairly modern kept air conditioner breakdown night wasnt hot rectified morning clue book online call book 9 available sister hotel walk book
